_sText:
Updates on August 30th 2010:
  • Fixed soundscapes
  • Added color correction inside and outside
  • Minor texture fixes
  • Modified inside lighting for more atmosphere
  • Reskinned default handrails
Updates on April 19th 2011:
  • File size optimizations
  • Scaled Lightmap grid
  • Fixed overmodulating color correction
  • Moved spawns to balance flanking bias
  • Improved soundscapes

Gameplay info:
Both teams can reach the buildings outer ledges from
their spawn by jumping onto the metal barrels on both
sides. It's possible to jump onto the double pipes on the left
in picture 1 and reach the right-hand building in the
back of picture 3.

Perfect map for small player counts and 1on1 matches. Enjoy! More projects at acidmaps.net
